actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that mother's insurance benefits will continue to be paid as long as the mother has in her care a child, entitled to child's insurance benefits, who is between ages 18 and 22 and is a full-time student.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to permit the payment of a mother's insurance benefit to a mother who has in her care a child between the ages of 18 and 22, who is a full-time student and is entitled to child's insurance benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that mother's insurance benefits will continue to be paid as long as the mother has in her care a child, entitled to child's insurance benefits, who is between ages 18 and 22 and is a full-time student.
